name: Jayant Yadav
body:
### EDUCATION

Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech), Computer Science & Engineering (2013 - 2017)  
Jaypee Institute of Information Technology, Noida  
CGPA : 7.50/10  

Class 10+2 (2012-2013)  
Army Public School Shankar Vihar, New Delhi  
CBSE   
Percentage: 92.2%   

Class 10 (2010-2011)  
Army Public School Shankar Vihar, New Delhi  
CBSE   
Percentage: 93.1%
Grade Point: 9.8  


### Experience  
**Web Developer**  
VisoinITLabs (Delhi)  
Jun 2016 - Aug 2016  
Full stack development of teacher's test preparation portal, to assist faculties to prepare academy's test papers more conveniently.   

**Web Developer**  
Dure Technologies (Mumbai)  
Jun 2015 - Jul 2015  
Designed a web interface for their new project about blood donation and requesting blood requests and giving information to the needy.  

### PROJECTS 
  
**Lazy Alarm**  
Jan 2015   
An alarm clock system made using arduino (ATmega 328).  
Consisted of a LCD screen, pressure sensor mat, buzzer, lights and fans.  
It was a system to wake up those who consider themselves lazy.     

**Link Prediction Algorithm**  
Jan 2015 - Mar 2015  
This project was made in C++ language.  
Shows the outcome of different types of link prediction algorithm and their precision in percentage.  

**mybharavyapar**  
Aug 2015 - Dec 2015  
an online platform for small shop vendors, helping them in making their businesses visible and acknowledged by the real world. The intended audience is the small business people and general public who wish to use their services.  

**Online Video Streaming**  
Mar 2016 - May 2016  
Doing video streaming using python programming language. working on Transport Layer, application of RTSP protocol.
Many clients can watch live video streaming from the server which has video uploaded by an android smartphone.  

### SKILLS
 
* HTML *Advanced*  
* CSS *Advanced*
* C/C++ *Intermediate*
* JavaScript *Intermediate*    
* Angular Js *Intermediate*
* PHP *Intermediate*     
* MySQL *Intermediate*          
* Adobe Photoshop *Intermediate*
* Java *Beginner*    
* Adobe Illustrator *Beginner*
* CodeIgniter *Beginner*   


###ACCOMPLISHMENTS AND VOLUNTEERING ACTIVITIES  
First Position, Robotics Competition,Impressions Jiit.  
First position,Football Tournament,Fun Sports Meet 2016.    
Participated in College Programming Compt. (Knuth Cup).   
Certificate of Participation, Techfest 2015 (IIT-Bombay).  
Volunteered at International Conference on Contemporary Computing (IC3)  



###AFFILIATIONS  
Google Developers Group (GDG-JIIT Noida)  
UCR Robotics Volunteer (JIIT Noida)  
Techfest Student Volunteer (IIT Bombay)  
FireFox Student Ambassador Program
